Jasny\HttpMessage\UploadedFile::getError

Retrieve the error associated with the uploaded file.

The return value is one of PHP's UPLOAD_ERR_XXX constants. If the file was uploaded successfully, this method returns UPLOAD_ERR_OK. Typically returns the value stored in the "error" key of the file in the $_FILES array.

    Signature

    public function getError()

    Returns

    int
    One of PHP's UPLOAD_ERR_XXX constants.
